original_text: So King Jehoram left Samaria to bring all Israel's army together. They were ready to attack Moab.
korean_text: 그 때에 여호람 왕이 사마리아에서 나가 온 이스라엘을 둘러보고

sentences.original_text: to bring all Israel's army together
They were ready to attack Moab
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 모압을 공격할 준비가 되어 있었다
